name: Totally Realistic Unicorn Buffalo Simulator
summary:
Achieve a completly new game experience and play as a Unicorn Buffalo! 
 
Enjoy challanging jump an runs like in the Buffalo simulator! 
 
Meet interresting and crazy characters! 
 
Over 16 crazy conversations! 
 
Enjoy realistic... Just kidding. Enjoy a adorable, cute grafic style! 
 
Try not to rage in this game. Did you know that unicorns dont rage?
